item.title: Answering Simple Questions in SQL Coding Interviews
item.description: Any database server will do. For this instance, MySQL is used. When I read this post I immeidately wondered if they were trick questions I wasn’t picking up on. They all seemed very easy to answer. They were a little tricky, but certainly not unreasonably complicated…

item.title: Query Stack Overflow for Top 5 Tags and Children Posts
item.description: You should give your query a title but it is not necessary. It does help keep track of your edits as you move along. I want to find the top five tags on Stack Overflow along with the top five posts per tag. The Stack Exchange Data Explorer gives us free access to this data. The data itself is slightly out-of-date, but this is fine…

item.title: Department Top Three Salaries

item.title: RStudio in Docker
item.description: When developing some of my applications I wanted the ability to test these applications on different versions of R. But setting this up on Linux proved to be more difficult than on my Windows machine. Docker makes it significantly easier…
